inclusion.criterion: Active Pulmonary Tuberculosis diagnosed by Sputum Smear positivity for Acid fast bacilli (AFB)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Not receiving vitamin D replacement or supplementation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of having been treated with antimycobacterial therapy for < 6 months or with < 4 first-line anti-tuberculous drugs
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Immune suppressed; with HIV infection, hepatic, renal failure, malignancy, diabetes mellitus
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Already on or requiring corticosteroids, immunosuppressive agents, thiazide diuretics
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Seriously ill or moribund patients with advanced respiratory impairment (cor pulmonale, hypercapnia, respiratory acidosis, congestive cardiac failure)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has active pulmonary tuberculosis diagnosed by sputum smear positivity for acid-fast bacilli. No history of treatment with antimycobacterial therapy or first-line anti-tuberculous drugs.
